text: Koke (born Jorge Resurección Meredio in Madrid on 8 January 1992) is a Spanish footballer. He plays as a midfielder for Atlético Madrid. He played for the Spain national football team at the 2012 Summer Olympics in London. == International career statistics == |- |2013||7||0 |- |2014||3||0 |- !Total||10||0 |} ==References== Category:Living people Category:1992 births Category:Footballers from Madrid Category:2022 FIFA World Cup players
